item.description:
Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream

The weather is once again interfering with our plans. I am still intending to see the show tonight if you care to join me. The rain location is at the Hoffman Auditorium on the St Josephs grounds. It may not be necessary to get there as early, the orginal idea was to picnic. As the weather looks like it is threatening the outdoor part, picnicing does not seem like an option. Why don't we meet at 7:00 in the front of the auditorium. I will wear the bw scarf with piano keys. If anyone is interested in having a drink or coffee after the show we can discuss that.


Performed by Capital Classics Shakespeare Company
http://www.capitalcla...
Preshow Entertainment: Elizabethan Consort


at the Outdoor Sunken Garden
St. Josephs College
Hartford,CT

$12.00
www.sjc.edu/arts
Frances Driscoll Box Office (860) 231-5555
www.tickets.sjc.edu
or at the door

Performance starts at 7:30.

Rain location is the Hoffman Auditorium
FREE PARKING! There is a parking lot immediately on the left at each Asylum Avenue entrance to Saint Joseph College. Park, and follow the walkways into the south quadrangle to the Bruyette Athenaeum.
item.how_to_find_us: I will fly the BW Piano Key Scarf on a tall stake, check out attending pictures to connect.
item.name: Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream
